info.title: Global Trade and Supply Chain - Test Endpoints
info.description: REST API for Global Trade and Supply Chain - Test Endpoints.

tags.name: Auditable Item Graph
tags.description: Endpoints which are modelled to access an auditable item graph contract.

requestBody.description: Create an auditable item graph vertex.

201.description: The rest request ended in created response.

400.description: The server cannot process the request, see the error field for more details.

401.description: You are not authorized to use the API or no credentials were supplied, see the error field for more details.

500.description: The server has encountered a situation it does not know how to handle, see the error field for more details.

get.summary: Query graph vertices by id or alias

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id or alias to try and find.

parameters.name: idMode
parameters.description: Which field to look in with the id, defaults to both.

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: The order for the results, default to created.

parameters.name: orderByDirection
parameters.description: The direction for the order, defaults to desc.

parameters.name: properties
parameters.description: The properties to return as a comma separated list, defaults to "id,created,aliases,metadata".

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: The optional cursor to get next chunk.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The maximum number of entities in a page.

200.description: The response to getting the a list of the vertices with matching ids or aliases.

400.description: The server cannot process the request, see the error field for more details.

401.description: You are not authorized to use the API or no credentials were supplied, see the error field for more details.

500.description: The server has encountered a situation it does not know how to handle, see the error field for more details.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the vertex to get.

parameters.name: includeDeleted
parameters.description: Whether to include deleted aliases, resource, edges, defaults to false.

parameters.name: includeChangesets
parameters.description: Whether to include the changesets of the vertex, defaults to false.

parameters.name: verifySignatureDepth
parameters.description: How many signatures to verify, none, current or all, defaults to "none".

200.description: Response to getting an auditable item graph vertex.

400.description: The server cannot process the request, see the error field for more details.

401.description: You are not authorized to use the API or no credentials were supplied, see the error field for more details.

500.description: The server has encountered a situation it does not know how to handle, see the error field for more details.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the vertex to update.

requestBody.description: Update an auditable item graph vertex.

204.description: The rest request ended in success with no data.

400.description: The server cannot process the request, see the error field for more details.

401.description: You are not authorized to use the API or no credentials were supplied, see the error field for more details.

500.description: The server has encountered a situation it does not know how to handle, see the error field for more details.

properties.description: Any additional information for the error.

stack.description: The stack trace for the error.

aliases.description: Alternative aliases that can be used to identify the vertex.

metadata.description: The metadata to be used in the vertex.

resources.description: The resources attached to the vertex.

edges.description: The edges connected to the vertex.

AuditableItemGraphCreateRequest.description: The data to be used in the vertex.

anyOf.description: Verify only the most recent signature.

VerifyDepth.description: How deep to verify the signatures.

verified.description: Whether the vertex has been verified.

verification.description: The verification changes including any failure information.

parentId.description: Which item is the parent of this change.

operation.description: The operation that was performed on the item.

properties.description: The properties from the modified object.

AuditableItemGraphChange.description: Interface describing a change in a property.

nodeIdentity.description: The identity of the node which controls the vertex.

updated.description: The timestamp of when the element was last updated.

aliases.description: Alternative aliases that can be used to identify the vertex.

resources.description: The resources attached to the vertex.

changesets.description: Changesets containing time sliced changes to the vertex.

created.description: The timestamp of when the element was created.

metadata.description: Metadata to associate with the element.
Metadata to associate with the element.

created.description: The timestamp of when the element was created.

deleted.description: The timestamp of when the element was deleted, as we never actually remove items. A property can also be marked as deleted if the value was updated, in which case a new value is created and the old one marked as deleted.

AuditableItemGraphAlias.description: Interface describing an alias for a vertex.

created.description: The timestamp of when the element was created.

deleted.description: The timestamp of when the element was deleted, as we never actually remove items. A property can also be marked as deleted if the value was updated, in which case a new value is created and the old one marked as deleted.

AuditableItemGraphProperty.description: Interface describing a property for vertex metadata.

metadata.description: Metadata to associate with the element.

created.description: The timestamp of when the element was created.

deleted.description: The timestamp of when the element was deleted, as we never actually remove items. A property can also be marked as deleted if the value was updated, in which case a new value is created and the old one marked as deleted.

AuditableItemGraphResource.description: Interface describing an auditable item graph vertex resource.

metadata.description: Metadata to associate with the element.

created.description: The timestamp of when the element was created.

deleted.description: The timestamp of when the element was deleted, as we never actually remove items. A property can also be marked as deleted if the value was updated, in which case a new value is created and the old one marked as deleted.

relationship.description: The relationship between the two vertices.

AuditableItemGraphEdge.description: Interface describing an edge between two vertices in an auditable item graph.

created.description: The timestamp of when the changeset was created.

userIdentity.description: The identity of the user who made the changeset.

immutableStorageId.description: The immutable storage id containing the signature for the changeset.

AuditableItemGraphChangeset.description: Interface describing a set of updates to the vertex.

aliases.description: Alternative aliases that can be used to identify the vertex.

metadata.description: The metadata to be used in the vertex.

resources.description: The resources attached to the vertex.

edges.description: The edges connected to the vertex.

AuditableItemGraphUpdateRequest.description: The data to be used in the vertex.

entities.description: The entities, which can be partial if a limited keys list was provided.

cursor.description: An optional cursor, when defined can be used to call find to get more entities.
